Option Explicit
Const sTitle = "Kassenbuch"
Sub Copy Dim sTableTitle as String Dim cEndbestand as currency Dim oDocument as object Dim oDispatcher as object Dim vStatus as Variant
oDocument = ThisComponent.CurrentController.Frame oDispatcher = createUnoService("com.sun.star.frame.DispatchHelper")
cEndbestand = ThisComponent.Sheets(0).getCellByPosition(4, 50).Value
nochmal: sTableTitle=InputBox("Bitte geben Sie den Namen des neuen Blatts ein!",sTitle) if sTableTitle = "" then vStatus=MsgBox("Sie haben noch keine Namen eingegeben!",37,sTitle) if vStatus=4 then goto nochmal elseif vStatus=2 then exit sub End if End if
ThisComponent.Sheets.CopyByName("Vorlage",sTableTitle,0)
Dim args1(0) as new com.sun.star.beans.PropertyValue args1(0).Name = "Nr" args1(0).Value = 1 oDispatcher.executeDispatch(oDocument, ".uno:JumpToTable", "", 0, args1())
ThisComponent.Sheets(0).getCellRangeByName("$J$5").string = sTableTitle ThisComponent.Sheets(0).getCellRangeByName("$F$15").value = cEndbestand
Dim args2(0) as new com.sun.star.beans.PropertyValue args2(0).Name = "ToPoint" args2(0).Value = "$E$16" oDispatcher.executeDispatch(oDocument, ".uno:GoToCell", "", 0, args2())
SetPrintArea()
End Sub
Sub SetPrintArea() DelPrintAreas()
Dim oPrintArea(0) as New com.sun.star.table.CellRangeAddress
With oPrintArea(0) .StartColumn = 2 .StartRow = 2 .EndColumn = 10 .EndRow = 52 End With
ThisComponent.currentController.activeSheet.setPrintAreas(oPrintArea()) End Sub
Sub DelPrintAreas() Dim oPrintArea() Dim iSheetNumber as Integer Dim iSheetCount as Integer iSheetCount=ThisComponent.Sheets.Count
For iSheetNumber=0 to iSheetCount-1 ThisComponent.Sheets(iSheetNumber).setPrintAreas(oPrintArea()) Next iSheetNumber End Sub
